long_description: Have you got an important meeting with a beach in your near future? The Quiksilver Swell Board Shorts for men offers timeless comfort to keep you on task when fun in the water won't wait. 4-way stretch fabric offers an easy range motion for comfort in the water and features a high recycled content. Wide elastic waistband keeps the fit comfortable; double-eyelet drawstring cinches the fit. Rip-and-stick side pocket holds a small item. Quiksilver Swell Board Shorts are machine washable.
short_description: Have you got an important meeting with a beach in your near future? The Quiksilver Swell Board Shorts for men offers timeless comfort to keep you on task when fun in the water won't wait.
